lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am no longer loaning money unless I can find loans with a Portfolio yield that is fair.  I believe kiva’s field partners are making an exorbitant return on the investment of our money. I’ve seen rates as high as 57.8%, some are much less like 19% but I think that these amounts are usurious and put are putting an unfair burden on people who cannot afford it. It is making the administrators of our money rich and keeping the ones we wanted to help in a cycle of debt to the banks. I would never take a loan or a credit card with even a 19% APR myself and I wouldn’t want anyone else to have to either.

lenders.name: Miranda
lenders.loan_because: I want to see my money go to a good cause directly and I like helping out others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in school so I can get a job at a hospital treating people with cancer.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to teach my son lessons that many of us often forget.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I can help others in a productive and direct way.  The small amount it takes to help someone really puts other things in life in perspective.

lenders.name: andy and jessica
lenders.loan_because: there is need. We have the ability to help, so we ought.
lenders.occupational_info:
We are a married couple who desires to serve their "neighbor" and in doing so serve God. 

Jesus points to a world that is a different from the one we have. The one we have says "save for yourself" and the one Jesus talks about says "spend, for there are people who need it, and you will be saving eternal worth, which is much more precious than anything a bank could give you." So we try to follow that.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I believe in one person helping another person.  I had someone believe in me and give me a chance, and now it is my privilege to do the same for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I help the elderly get their houses organized, clear out the clutter, even help them pack and move if they need to.  I really love working with older people, they have amazing stories to share.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Jesus Christ and want these loans to offer hope and God's love to people who are beyond my physical reach.  Thank you Kiva.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Do unto others.
lenders.occupational_info: I admire and respect the heroism of any person who is devoted to honesty and hard work and rejects the temptation to take unfair advantage.  My work as a peace officer allowed me the privilege to serve and protect these heroes.
